alert.note: Alert for Kaufman (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued November 04 at 4:42PM CDT until November 04 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 515 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN HUNT...NORTHEASTERN KAUFMAN...NORTHWESTERN VAN ZANDT...SOUTHWESTERN HOPKINS AND NORTHWESTERN RAINS COUNTIES... At 441 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Hawk Cove, or 8 miles northwest of Wills Point, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Greenville, Terrell, West Tawakoni, Quinlan, East Tawakoni, Point, Cumby, Campbell, Hawk Cove, Greenville Club Lake, Lake Tawakoni, Lake Tawakoni State Park, New Terrell City Lake, Elmo, Lone Oak, Alsa, Cash, Flats, Center Point and Hermits Cove. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for north central Texas.
